Timmy,

Did you read our paper "Competitive Coevolution through Evolutionary 
Complexification?"  I believe it describes the robot duel domain in 
detail.  If you've already read it let me know and I can give you 
more specific details if you still need them.

The paper is here:

http://nn.cs.utexas.edu/keyword?stanley:jair04

ken

>

input

of

was

into

type
